item.title: [C# Tip] How to create and access custom C# Attributes by using Reflection
item.description: In C#, Attributes are a handy mechanism to attach metadata to your classes, methods, properties, etc. In this article, we will see how to create custom Attributes and access them at runtime using Reflection. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/csharptips/custom-csharp-attributes-reflection/
